learning_objectives: {"Diagnose common respiratory conditions","Recognize signs of respiratory distress","Manage acute asthma exacerbations"}
{"Evaluate heart murmurs in children","Recognize signs of congenital heart disease","Manage acute cardiac conditions"}
{"Assess growth parameters","Identify developmental delays","Counsel families about normal development"}
{"Differentiate viral from bacterial infections","Select appropriate antibiotic therapy","Manage febrile infants"}
{"Diagnose common skin conditions","Prescribe appropriate topical treatments","Recognize concerning skin lesions"}
{"Evaluate acute abdominal pain","Manage gastroenteritis","Recognize signs of dehydration"}
{"Evaluate seizures in children","Assess neurological development","Manage acute neurological emergencies"}
{"Recognize pediatric emergencies","Perform pediatric resuscitation","Stabilize critically ill children"}
{"Screen for mental health conditions","Provide initial counseling","Know when to refer"}
{"Follow vaccination schedules","Counsel parents about vaccines","Manage vaccine reactions"}
